stream.input

Class InputCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • stream.StreamCore
      • stream.input.InputCore
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    InputDecompress, InputDecrypt, InputSplit

    public abstract class InputCore
extends StreamCore
    Abstract class which extends the generic StreamCore. Used for write with StreamCore.writeParts() and for read the header file. Update the successfulFlag if some error occur
    Author:
    Meschio

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InputCore(java.lang.String srcPath, FileElement data)
      Constructor of InputCore, call the parent constructor StreamCore, set the fileProgress value and read the headerFile.

      • writeParts

        public void writeParts()
                throws java.lang.Exception
        writeParts specialized class of InputCore(java.lang.String, logic.FileElement) for chop a file with every part of it.

        Update the StreamCore.data status of the operation for the TableView set the StreamCore.successfulFlag to false if some error occur. rely of the set setOutputStream(java.lang.String) and get getOutputStream() specialized in the inherited class, and rely to handleMethodStartOperation(int) and handleMethodEndOperation() for cycle operations specialized in the inherited class

        Specified by:
        writeParts in class StreamCore
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception
